name: The Literary Coffee House 'Citadel'
short_description: A quiet place, ideal for reading and study sessions. Excellent espresso.

name: Restaurant 'The Old Inn'
short_description: Traditional Romanian dishes, generous servings, and live folk music.

name: The Global Wok Bistro
short_description: Fast and tasty Asian food, a favorite among Polytechnic students.

name: Café 'New World'
short_description: Modern design, perfect for a relaxed brunch. They have the best cakes.

name: Pizzeria 'Il Drago'
short_description: Wood-fired oven pizza, authentic Italian ingredients. Excellent for groups.

name: Vegan Restaurant 'The Green Garden'
short_description: Healthy, plant-based options. Fresh smoothies and delicious cream soups.

name: Coffee Shop 'By The Faculty'
short_description: Strategic location near the campus. Quick and affordable student lunch menu.

name: Burger Shack
short_description: The best artisanal burgers in town, featuring Black Angus beef.

name: Tea House 'Sunset'
short_description: An oasis of calm with over 50 types of tea and ambient music.

name: Restaurant Pescaresc 'The Sea'
short_description: Fresh fish and seafood specialties, with a view of the sea.

name: Bistro 'At The Forest'
short_description: International menu, green terrace. Ideal for a romantic dinner.

name: Gaming Coffee Shop 'Restart'
short_description: Board games, consoles, and coffee. An excellent place for socializing.

name: Trattoria 'Bella Vita'
short_description: Homemade pasta and Italian wines. Mediterranean atmosphere.

name: Bread and Coffee
short_description: Artisanal bakery with specialty coffees. Ideal for breakfast.

name: Fast-Food 'Döner King'
short_description: Döner Kebab and Shawarma. Quick and filling option after classes.

name: Restaurant 'The Citadel'
short_description: Traditional Transylvanian food, next to the Medieval Citadel.

name: Smoothie Bar 'Energy'
short_description: Smoothies, natural juices, and acai bowls for an energy boost.

name: Restaurant 'Grandma's House'
short_description: Fixed (lunch) menu, cheap and tasty, just like home.

name: Irish Pub 'The Shamrock'
short_description: Craft beer, quiz nights, and live sports. Popular student spot.

name: Coffee Shop 'Zen'
short_description: Minimalist design, specialty coffee, and relaxing background music.
